name: Tyler
description: John Tyler succeeded W.H. Harrison (who died in office) and served as president for 4 years.

name: Fillmore
description: Millard Fillmore succeeded Zachary Taylor (who died in office) and served as president for 3 years.

name: Johnson
description: Andrew Johnson succeeded Abraham Lincoln (who died in office) and served as president for 4 years.

name: Arthur
description: Chester A. Arthur succeeded James A. Garfield (who died in office) and served as president for 3 years.

name: T. Roosevelt
description: Theodore Roosevelt succeeded William McKinley (who died in office) and served as president for 8 years.

name: Coolidge
description: Calvin Coolidge succeeded Warren G. Harding (who died in office) and served as president for 6 years.
